title: Tribunal.
body:
Ive just forgotten whats happening to our current one.
Weren't they all gonna be merged or some shit?

Its been a very long time that Ive forgotten about it.

replies.body:
Can they at least give us an update about it?
thats really all I want.

Pretty sure NA lol posts updates on the tribunal upgrade, as they actually have a tribunal to give an upgrade.

We will get a final product when they're done.
I think they did not too long ago in the Player Behaviour FAQ, though it was only a "we're still working on it" thing.
no server has it, it's being fixed cause it didn't work.
